channel.title: Private Habbo Hotel Help!
channel.description:
hi. thankyou for taking notice of my topic. i'm currently in need of help, i need to know how to create a habbo hotel private server. i need to know everything.
• i need the best starting source. • i need a loader that works for that source. • i need to find out my ip adress, correctly. • i need to make it so i can log onto the private server.
thankyou, i hope someone can help me.
:)

item.title: Private Habbo Hotel Help!
item.dc:creator: @giggsy giggsy
item.description:
@giggsy wrote:

use debbo v3… if your not familiar to all like holo and that coz that requires alot more to do… debbo v3 is the easiest one to use! go to whatsmyip.org to find your ip… i sugest not to put your actual ip i would get no-ip download it and register from http://www.no-ip.com and you need to port forward your port! … the defualt ports are 1232 and 90 debbo v3.5- http://rapidshare.com/files/80193855/Debbo_v3.5.rar.html

if need any more help with portforawrding or anything email at giggsy_killaz@hotmail.com or giggsy@nannosoft.netii.net

~giggsy

Read full topic
